labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The red unread message badge still shows even though the option is disabled
data.expected_result: There should not be a red unread message badge over the discord icon
data.short_description: Unread message badge appears even when disabled if there are pending friend requests
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone send you a friend request - Turn off "enable unread message badge" in Notifications settings
